SELECT /* rbb1010_s01 */ A.DOC_YEARMON ,A.DOC_NUMBER ,A.BBS_ID ,RPAD(' ', DOC_INDENT*2)||DECODE(DOC_INDENT,0,'','[re] ')||DOC_SUBJECT DOC_SUBJECT ,A.DOC_TEXT ,A.DOC_WRITER ,A.DOC_WRITER_NAME ,A.DOC_ATT_CNT ,A.DOC_SEQ ,A.DOC_REGDATE ,A.DOC_REF_CNT ,B.USER_GROUP_NAME
FROM BBS_DOC A, PT_USER B WHERE A.DOC_WRITER = B.USER_ID AND A.BBS_ID= ? AND SUBSTR(A.DOC_REGDATE,0,8) >= ? AND SUBSTR(A.DOC_REGDATE,0,8) <= ? --AND A.DOC_REGDATE < '2014071001' --TOMMY임시.20140706 ORDER BY DOC_SEQ DESC, DOC_SUBSEQ

SELECT * FROM( SELECT /* commonMain_s07 */ A.DOC_YEARMON ,A.DOC_NUMBER ,A.BBS_ID ,A.DOC_SUBJECT ,A.DOC_TEXT ,A.DOC_WRITER ,A.DOC_WRITER_NAME ,A.DOC_ATT_CNT ,A.DOC_SEQ ,A.DOC_REGDATE ,A.DOC_REF_CNT ,B.USER_GROUP_NAME
FROM BBS_DOC A, PT_USER B WHERE A.DOC_WRITER = B.USER_ID AND A.BBS_ID= ? AND A.DOC_INDENT = 0 --AND A.DOC_REGDATE < '2014071001' --TOMMY임시.20140706 ORDER BY DOC_SEQ DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <=10

SELECT * FROM( SELECT /* rbb1010_s02 */ A.DOC_YEARMON ,A.DOC_NUMBER ,A.BBS_ID ,A.DOC_SUBJECT ,A.DOC_TEXT ,A.DOC_WRITER ,A.DOC_WRITER_NAME ,A.DOC_ATT_CNT ,A.DOC_SEQ ,A.DOC_REGDATE ,A.DOC_REF_CNT ,B.USER_GROUP_NAME ,DECODE(A.BBS_ID,'B0010831','공지사항','B0010832','경륜.경정','B0010834' ,'신문기사','B0010835','지점게시판','B0010836','이벤트','B0010837','사업지식','') BBS_NM FROM BBS_DOC A, PT_USER B WHERE A.DOC_WRITER = B.USER_ID AND A.BBS_ID IN ('B0010831','B0010832','B0010834','B0010835','B0010836','B0010837') AND A.DOC_INDENT = 0 --AND A.DOC_REGDATE < '2014071001' --TOMMY임시.20140706 ORDER BY DOC_REGDATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <=30
